radiographic_examinations.findings: Bilateral ground-glass opacities in a mosaic distribution; no consolidation.

New consolidations in the dependent portions of the bilateral lower lobes and inferior lingula; new interlobular septal thickening, bilateral ground-glass opacities, trace bilateral pleural effusions, subpleural reticulations; no intrathoracic lymphadenopathy.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Progression from previously observed ground-glass opacities to consolidations.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Patchy linear opacity at the base of the left lung.
Moderate oropharyngeal dysphagia and intermittent trace aspiration.
